com.yantra.api.omp.order

Interface reworkQuote

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    com.yantra.api.OMPApi, YIFApi

    public interface reworkQuote

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.w3c.dom.Document reworkQuote(YFSEnvironment env, org.w3c.dom.Document inXML)
      The reworkQuote API moves the quote to created status.

    • Method Detail

      • reworkQuote

        org.w3c.dom.Document reworkQuote(YFSEnvironment env,
                                 org.w3c.dom.Document inXML)
                          throws com.yantra.yfs.japi.YFSException,
                                 java.rmi.RemoteException

        The reworkQuote API moves the quote to created status. The API also removes approval holds on the quote. Notes can be added to the quote to indicate the corresponding change of status. If "IsExpirationDateOverridden" flag is not Y and RECOMPUTE_EXPIRATION_DATE rule is Y, ExpirationDate on the order entity is set to null. The rework of quote can happen in two cases.
        1. Adding a recommended line to the quote triggers re-pricing changes for the quote.
        2. Changes to a quote are made prior to conversion to Order to address any inconsistencies. These changes will require re-acceptance by the buyer/customer.

        Related Documents
        Input XML Input DTD Output XML Output DTD Error XML Error DTD

        User Exits: None

        Events Raised:
        Events must be set up for the transaction calling this API.
        ON_SUCCESS:

          Data publish - REWORK_QUOTE.ON_STATUS_CHANGE.xml
          Key data - modifyOrder_dbd.txt

        Template Support:
        No.

        Audits: None

        Pre-conditions: None

        Post-conditions: None

        Database Extensibility Support: No

        Parameters:
        env - Required. Environment handle returned by createEnvironment.
        inXML - Required. For more information, see the associated input xml files.

        Returns:
        An XML document of the Order. For details on the output, refer to the associated output files.
        Throws:
        com.yantra.yfs.japi.YFSException - Exception containing error codes in the standard error files.
        java.rmi.RemoteException
